body_html:
Hello,I want ask a question,I use cuda9.2,but when I run:
sudo python /opt/caffe2/pytorch/caffe2/python/operator_test/relu_op_test.py
I get warning:
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: libcurand.so.9.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
I don't know why,have you met these problems?If you have,how did you mix it?

body:
Hello,I want ask a question,I use cuda9.2,but when I run:
sudo python /opt/caffe2/pytorch/caffe2/python/operator_test/relu_op_test.py
I get warning:
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: libcurand.so.9.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
I don't know why,have you met these problems?If you have,how did you mix it?
